snippet: A new survey by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention found an increase in autism diagnoses. Children and communities will need more support.
abstract: Editorial reflects upon results of latest federal survey by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, which finds an increase in autism diagnoses in children; suggests that more children and parents may need help coping with these disorders in their schools and communities.
lead_paragraph: A new survey by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention found an increase in autism diagnoses. Children and communities will need more support.

headline.seo: The Puzzle of More Autism Cases
headline.main: The Puzzle of More Autism Cases
headline.print_headline: The Puzzle of More Autism Cases
